thread.section_title: New York High School Sports Headlines
thread.title: Sharette Dixon Classic 2015

title: Sharette Dixon Classic 2015
text: Talk about it in the nychoops Message Boards The Sharette Dixon Classic is a one-day event featuring the top boys' high school basketball from New York and New Jersey. This annual event is being organized in memory of Sharette Dixon, wife of Kimani Young and mother of Kamaal Young (13), Khaliq Young (11) and Salimah Young (9). Proceeds from the event will support a family education fund that has been established for the three children.This year's event will take place on Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015, at the Gauchos Gym in the Bronx, NY. Format : The Sharette Dixon Classic will feature two premiere contests, an underclassmen game and upperclassmen game. The games will feature top-notch coaching and emphasize teamwork and sportsmanship. Top Players Expected to Participate :
